purpose: Explore, test and experiment using JS frameworks (react, angular, vue, etc) inside of HubSpot CMS.
text: set the channel description: Explore, test and experiment using JS frameworks (react, angular, vue, etc) inside of HubSpot CMS.

A few of you have been chatting about or exploring how to better use JS frameworks within HubSpot CMS.

I thought we could create a small "Let's Explore This!" channel and collaborate.
> - Brainstorm
> - Experiment
> - Document

Could be a fun little working group. :slightly_smiling_face:
If we don't find this helpful or it doesn't pan out ... we can close this channel down.
Adding this conversation here for context: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CBA9UA4EN/p1563201479108000>

And pulling this post over to explain where <@UL1S6TULB>’s head is at:
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CBA9UA4EN/p1565365323070900?thread_ts=1563201479.108000&cid=CBA9UA4EN>

Felt like lots of side conversations around the same topic... might as well all work together to figure it out.
If you hear of anyone else trying to do this... feel free to invite them or point them to this channel. :slightly_smiling_face:

topic: Small working group (open to all) for brainstorming, exploring, and experiment the use of JS frameworks (react, angular, vue, etc) and outside design systems inside of HubSpot CMS.
text: set the channel topic: Small working group (open to all) for brainstorming, exploring, and experiment the use of JS frameworks (react, angular, vue, etc) and outside design systems inside of HubSpot CMS.
It’s interesting, not going to lie
It was not a smoothie. It was a milkshake.
